entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Clinton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:49 AM PST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, 1.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Clinton 09:08 AM PST Monday 26 December 2022
Condition: Partly Cloudy
Temperature: 1.5°C
Pressure: 99.7 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 93 %
Dewpoint: 0.5°C
Wind: SSE 26 km/h gust 41 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries early this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Risk of freezing rain early this morning. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 this morning then becoming southeast 20 this afternoon. High plus 4. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening. Snow beginning after midnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the morning then cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h in the afternoon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Monday 26 December 2022
